<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/member/{docId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Add a member by (optionally) an Id

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"docId","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"String Id of the member"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"description":"Name of the member","type":"string"},"desc":{"description":"Description of the member","type":"string"},"color":{"description":"Color of the object (\\#ffffff, \\#ffffffff or ffffff)","type":"string"},"pronouns":{"description":"Pronouns of the member","type":"string"},"pkId":{"description":"PluralKit ID of the member, 5-letter string","type":"string"},"avatarUrl":{"description":"URL for the avatar","type":"string"},"private":{"description":"Whether this object is private","type":"boolean"},"preventTrusted":{"description":"Wheter trusted friends are prevented from seeing this private object","type":"boolean"},"supportDescMarkdown":{"description":"Whether the description supports markdown","type":"boolean"},"preventsFrontNotifs":{"description":"Whether to prefer front notification changes","type":"boolean"},"info":{"description":"Info object","type":"object","properties":{"*":{"type":"string","description":"Info object entry, id/key has to match an id/key from the user object, value is the value string"}}}},"title":"member"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK"},"404":{"description":"NOT FOUND"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
